name: ALVO VR
description:
Alvo is a unique competitive FPS designed from the ground up for VR to provide some of the most thrilling and intense combat seen in the VR FPS genre. Trading ultra-realism for faster-paced gameplay, Alvo is a finely-tuned cocktail of mechanics that will keep you addicted and coming back round after round.

  • Free for all
  • Team Deathmatch
  • Hardpoint
  • Search and Destroy
  • Zombies

Accessibility:


Not all gamers want or have the same play-style, we understand this and try to accommodate for everyone. You can play Alvo sitting or standing, using manual reload or button reload, and choose the amount of in-game UI you want to see.

Customization:


  • In-game UI color theme
  • Weapon attachments
  • Weapon skins
  • Characters
  • Perks
  • Killstreaks
